010package imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.nonlinear;
011
012import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
013import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntDouble;
014import imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.Mapping2D;
015
016/*
017 * Note: This class has been deprecated and substituted by an ImageJ plugin.
018 */
019@Deprecated
020public class TwirlMapping implements Mapping2D {
021        
022        private final double xc, yc, angle, rad;
023   
024        public TwirlMapping (double xc, double yc, double angle, double rad) {
025                this.xc = xc;
026                this.yc = yc;
027                this.angle = angle;
028                this.rad = rad;
029        }
030
031        public Pnt2d applyTo(Pnt2d pnt) {
032                final double x = pnt.getX();
033                final double y = pnt.getY();
034                double dx = x - xc;
035                double dy = y - yc;
036                double d = Math.sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);
037                if (d < rad) {
038                        double a = Math.atan2(dy,dx) + angle * (rad-d) / rad;
039                        double x1 = xc + d * Math.cos(a);
040                        double y1 = yc + d * Math.sin(a);
041                        return PntDouble.from(x1, y1);
042                }
043                return PntDouble.from(x, y);
044        }
045}
046
